channel.title: Comments on: Coins and Tokens: What is the difference between them?

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Wow. I definitely learnt something new today. I had no idea of this before and I thought both are same. Coin acts as a digital money while tokens are user for functionality purpose
item.content:encoded:
Wow. I definitely learnt something new today.
I had no idea of this before and I thought both are same.
Coin acts as a digital money while tokens are user for functionality purpose

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: I'm glad because I can now differentiate between token and coin. So, I won't misuse the two words anymore.
item.content:encoded: I’m glad because I can now differentiate between token and coin. So, I won’t misuse the two words anymore.

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
Thank you for this explanation. I may not be able to explain if asked.
Very detailed. Sharing to others.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for this explanation. I may not be able to explain if asked.

item.title: By: Igwetoo
item.dc:creator: Igwetoo
item.description: Wow! This is exactly what people really need, I can't stop equipping myself with lots of knowledge about crypto. All thanks to Atomic.
item.content:encoded: Wow! This is exactly what people really need, I can’t stop equipping myself with lots of knowledge about crypto. All thanks to Atomic.
